titles.title: Providing that the House of Representatives should pass a budget resolution for a fiscal year before the House considers any appropriation bill for that year.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 6/23/2010--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that before Congress considers any appropriation bill for a particular fiscal year, the House should first pass a budget resolution for that year.
